text: Royara rate tomadera stridera sathe sahabasa kara tomadera jan'ya halala kara hayeche. Tara tomadera paricchada ebam tomara tadera paricchada. Allaha abagata rayechena ye, tomara atnapratarana karachile, sutaram tini tomaderake ksama karechena ebam tomadera abyahati diyechena. Atahpara tomara nijedera stridera sathe sahabasa kara ebam ya kichu tomadera jan'ya allaha dana karechena, ta aharana kara. Ara panahara kara yataksana na kala rekha theke bhorera subhra rekha pariskara dekha yaya. Atahpara roya purna kara rata paryanta. Ara yataksana tomara etekapha abasthaya masajide abasthana kara, tataksana paryanta stridera sathe miso na. E'i halo allaha kartrka bemdhe deya simana. Ata'eba, era kache'o ye'o na. Emanibhabe barnana karena allaha nijera ayata samuha manusera jan'ya, yate tara bamcate pare.
